label: ExperienceProgramAction
comment: Any type of action, such as searching, reserving, or paying, necessary for an experience program, such as an adventure experience, a business experience, or a wellness experience.

datatypeProperties.comment: A type, expressed as text, for this corrective action.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A party specified for this experience event.
